Title: sipHash128
Description: Like sipHash64 but produces a 128-bit hash value, i.e. the final xor-folding state is done up to 128 bits.

NoteThis 128-bit variant differs from the reference implementation and it's weaker.
This version exists because, when it was written, there was no official 128-bit extension for SipHash.
New projects should probably use sipHash128Reference.
A 128-bit SipHash hash value of type FixedString(16).
